## CharityORG.getVolunteerInfo() method

Get information about a specific volunteer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getVolunteerInfo(name: string): CharityVolunteerInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of volunteer. |

**Returns:**

[CharityVolunteerInfo](./bitburner.charityvolunteerinfo.md)

Object containing stat and equipment-related information about a volunteer.
